product_name: Columbia Bora Bora Booney II Hat
long_description: Be sure to bring the Columbia Bora Bora(TM) Booney II hat along when you head out in sunny climates. The wide brim and UPF fabric protect you from the sun. Textured nylon poplin shell provides UPF 50 protection from harmful solar rays. Polyester sweatband and mesh interior wicks sweat off your head to keep you cool and comfortable. Adjust the fit of the hat with the drawcord and toggle in back. Adjustable chin strap secures the Columbia Bora Bora Booney II hat when the wind picks up.
short_description: Be sure to bring the Columbia Bora Bora(TM) Booney II hat along when you head out in sunny climates. The wide brim and UPF fabric protect you from the sun.
